text: Hello there!  Where are you from?
Hi, I'm in Hawaii! What kind of children's charities do you know about?
I've recently been informed of Save the Children.   Have you heard of this organization?
It sounds familiar. What do they do?

Through the help of sponsorships and donations, they're working to help children...I'm learning about this myself now, too.   Education, poverty issues, healthcare, emergency response.   That's not all...would you like to check out their website?
Sure, what is it?
Here is the link  URL
They look really good. I think I've seen their commercials.

Me too.  Those commercials make me so sad!   In the U.S. and around the world, Save the Children does whatever it takes Â¡Âª every day and in times of crisis Â¡Âª to ensure children grow up healthy, learning and safe. Learn about the places we work, the challenges children face and the results we achieve, thanks to supporters like me and you.
I see. It seems like they're involved in a lot of areas.
Indeed.  They also make it really easy to donate, and every little bit helps.  How would you feel about donating a portion of your earnings from this task to Save the Children?
I would be fine with that. I don't mind donating because I think the money is more important to them than it is to me.
Fantastic!  Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment.  You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment.  How much would you like to give?
How about .20?
Great!   That's really good news.  I believe it will go to good use. The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.
That's nice. I would like that.
Me too!   Thanks so much!   Have a great night!
Ok, you too. Glad this worked out!
Me too, this was neat.
I think we have to complete 10 turns, so here's to another one! Let's save the children together!
